title: Ep. 39 :: Talking Commodities with Two of the Best
itunes:title: Talking Commodities with Two of the Best
description: Matt Badiali, editor of the S&A Resource Report, talks about the huge potential for uranium. Jeff Clark, editor of Casey's Gold and Resource Report, explains why these gold and silver stocks belong in your portfolio.
